name: Christmas Santa Claus Album
description:
Do you like Christmas? So this game is for you! Every day you get 3 free packets for you to earn new Christmas stickers to stick to your album or exchange with friends.

• PLAY WITH FRIENDS •
In Christmas Album you can exchange repeated stickers with friends and also ask for those stickers you don't have. Play now and invite your friends to help you to collect all the stickers as fast as possible!

• A LOT OF SITCKERS •
Playing Christmas Album you will find several stickers, Santa Claus, Christmas Tree, Bauble, Bells and more! There are more than 17 pages of stickers to stick. Do not waste more time, download now to quickly complete your album before the Christmas Day.

• FEATURES •
- 100+ stickers
- 17 pages of stickers
- Rare stickers
- 3 packets of stickers each day
- Exchange stickers with friends
- Exchange stickers for extra packets
- Play with friends

Can you complete your album? Download it now and do it with your friends!
